name: Travels of a Merchant's
description:
Travels of a Merchant's - An adventure in a fantasy world where you take on the role of a merchant's assistant, completing a variety of tasks and adventures. Your character sets off on a journey through mysterious and dangerous lands, where exciting adventures await him, completing tasks from the merchant!

You have to fight dangerous monsters and explore various territories.

Immerse yourself in an exciting fantasy world, become the best assistant merchant and experience unforgettable adventures in this exciting game.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Interesting gameplay
- Good soundtrack
